sentences.en: A ferocious battle to select a new parliamentary candidate is in progress.
sentences.cn: 推选一位新的议会候选人的激战正酣。

sentences.en: British Parliamentary procedure is perplexing at the best of times.
sentences.cn: 即使在最好情况下，英国议会的程序也很费解。

sentences.en: He has remained largely aloof from the hurly - burly of parliamentary politics.
sentences.cn: 他基本上一直对喧嚣的议会政治漠不关心.

sentences.en: He used his influence to make sure she was not selected as a parliamentary candidate.
sentences.cn: 他利用自己的影响力阻挠她当选议员候选人。

sentences.en: He was infinitely more assured than in his more recent parliamentary appearances.
sentences.cn: 比起最近几次在国会中的露面，他表现得自信多了。

sentences.en: Her parliamentary career has occupied all of her time.
sentences.cn: 她整日忙于议会的工作。

sentences.en: His tactics were to entangle the opposition in a web of parliamentary procedure.
sentences.cn: 他的策略是使反对派陷入错综复杂的议会程序之中。

sentences.en: It remains to be seen whether her parliamentary colleagues will agree.
sentences.cn: 她的国会同僚是否同意，现在还无从知晓。

sentences.en: Parliamentary leaders agreed to take all such decisions by a show of hands.
sentences.cn: 议会领导人同意所有这样的决定都要举手表决。

sentences.en: The country's election commission has advanced the date of parliamentary elections by three days.
sentences.cn: 该国的选举委员会将议会选举日期提前了3天。

sentences.en: The minister air-dashed to Delhi because of the parliamentary crisis.
sentences.cn: 部长因议会危机立刻起程飞往德里。

sentences.en: The polls have closed in the Pakistan parliamentary elections.
sentences.cn: 巴基斯坦议会选举投票已结束。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has been briefed by her parliamentary aides.
sentences.cn: 首相已听取了她议会助手的简要汇报。
世界上最古老的议会民主制

sentences.en: There was a crescendo of parliamentary and press criticism.
sentences.cn: 来自议会和新闻界的批评越来越多。

sentences.en: They will bring in a parliamentary bill.
sentences.cn: 他们将提出一项国会提案.

words.tran_cn: 国会议员，熟练而又有经验的议员
偏狭，狭隘；教区制度；乡土观念；眼界狭小
议会的；国会的；议会制度的

phrases.tran_cn: 议会制；议会政体（等于parliamentary government）

trans.tran_cn: 议会的，国会的，议会制度的，根据议会的
trans.tran_en: relating to or governed by a parliament
